text: Minor Victories is the self-titled debut studio album by British alternative rock supergroup Minor Victories. It was released on 3 June 2016 on Fat Possum Records and PIAS Recordings. ==Accolades== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Publication ! Accolade ! Year ! Rank |- | Rough Trade | Albums of the Year | 2016 | |} == Track listing == ==Personnel== *Rachel Goswell – vocals, guitar *Stuart Braithwaite – guitar, backing vocals *Justin Lockey – guitar, electronics, keyboards *James Lockey - bass *Mark Kozelek – vocals on "For You Always" *James Alexander Graham – vocals on "Scattered Ashes (Song for Richard)" == References == Category:2016 debut albums Category:Minor Victories albums Category:Fat Possum Records albums Category:PIAS Recordings albums
title: Minor Victories (album)
